title: Cool off by the Pool! Beautifully Renovated 1ba1ba
posting_body: Beautifully renovated 2 bedroom/2 bath apartment homes coming available; first and second floor, single and dual master suite options.
Our Stanley property is conveniently located in the Citrus Grove neighborhood of Glendale and features a swimming pool and barbecue area for residents in a beautiful courtyard setting.

Interior renovations include luxury plank flooring in the living areas, new plush carpeting in the bedrooms, all new stainless-steel appliances including refrigerator, gas range, microwave and dishwasher; beautiful stone granite countertops in the kitchen and bathrooms, new cabinets and fixtures throughout; as well as central air conditioning and heat with digital programmable Nest thermostat.
-Easy Access to World Class Shopping & Dining
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
